page.title: 18TYPES OF FARMS IN PENNARD.
page.content: THERE ARE MANY TYPES OF FARM IN OUR AREA. THERE ARE ARABLE, DAIRY AND BEEF CATTLE FARMING. MOST FARMS ARE ARABLE AND BEEF CATTLE, THERE ARE ONE OR TWO THAT JUST HAVE ARABLE, THEN THE REMAINING FEW ARE DAIRY FARMERS. MOST FARMS IN OUR AREA, ARE OVER A HUNDRED YEARS OLD. NOT MANY FARMS HAVE THE SAME NUMBER OF ACRES AS EACH OTHER BECAUSE IT DEPENDS ON THE VARIOUS TYPES OF SOIL AND THEIR PRODUCE. MOST OF THE NEW FARMERS IN OUR AREA WHO ARE ARABLE FARMERS, FIND THAT AFTER THE FIRST YEAR IT BECOMES EASIER TO FARM BECAUSE THEY GET TO KNOW THE FARM LAND. IN A DUAL PURPOSE e.g.CROPS AND ANIMALS MOST OF THE LAND IS USED FOR CROPS AND SILAGE, THE REST IS USED FOR GRAZING OR PLEASURE.
